amendment.description: Amendment sought to appropriate $2.5 million to re-institute the Office of Technology Assessment (OTA), offset from funds from the Architect of the Capitol's Capital Construction and Operations Account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in House Report 114-611 to appropriate $2.5 million to re-institute the Office of Technology Assessment (OTA), offset from funds from the Architect of the Capitol's Capital Construction and Operations Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Takano amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 179 - 223 (Roll no. 291).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Takano amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 179 - 223 (Roll no. 291).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Takano.
